Getting Started
=====================

Here is a simple guide to get you started with the PoseEstimator program.
------------------------------------

To run the PoseEstimator program, you need to install the required packages. You can install the required packages by running the following command:

.. code-block:: bash

   $ pip install -r requirements.txt 

After installing the required packages, you can run the PoseEstimator program by running the following command:

.. code-block:: bash
   
      $ python PoseEstimator/pose_estimator.py
